meanings.definition: (Latin) to fully enjoy, to have full enjoyment of
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to enjoy to the full, have the full enjoyment of
meanings.notes: This is a Latin verb. It takes the ablative case.

inflection.notes: Deponent verb; only passive forms exist with active meaning.

usage_notes.explanation: Perfruor is a deponent verb in Latin, meaning it has passive forms but active meanings. It takes an object in the ablative case. It indicates a complete or thorough enjoyment of something.
